verbose_text: The mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK)/ERK cascade and the proliferation of endothelial cells are activated by the phosphorylation of Tyr1175 of VEGFR2, which also mediates the VEGF induced activation of Src mediated vascular permeability and cell migration.
evidence: mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK)/ERK cascade and the proliferation of endothelial cells are activated by the phosphorylation of Tyr1175 of VEGFR2, which also mediates the VEGF-induced activation of Src
